typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		NOMBRE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		NOMBRE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Fecha as string,
		Nombres as string,
		Apellidos as string,
		Edad as string,
		Genero as string,
		Discapacidad as string,
		Tipo_discapacidad as string,
		Nivel_educacion as string,
		Ingles as string,
		Cursos as string,
		Informatica as string,
		Certificacion_competencias as string,
		Laborando as string,
		Organizacion as string,
		Teletrabajado as string,
		Internet as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source3
source1 derive(GENERO = "FEMENINO") ~> DerivedColumn2
source2 derive(GENERO = "MASCULINO") ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(FUENTE = "DNP CONTEXTO") ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
